CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Mesoblast Ltd is a clinical-stage biotechnology company. It develops and commercializes innovative allogeneic cellular medicines to treat complex diseases resistant to the conventional standard of care. Its portfolio of Phase 3 product candidates comprises remestemcel-L for the treatment of steroid-refractory acute graft versus host disease (SR-aGVHD), and for moderate to severe acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) and others.

value.name: Silviu Itescu
value.title: Chief Executive Officer, Executive Director & MD
